com.riskgame.strategy

Class Benevolent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.strategy.Benevolent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerStrategy

    public class Benevolent
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerStrategy
    Benevolent player reinforces its weakest countries, does not attack, fortifies by moving armies to weaker countries
    Author:
    Anusha
